SELECT cc.*,ag.`grid_name`,et.`type_name` FROM cle_case_registration cc LEFT JOIN area_grid ag ON ag.id =cc.`gird_id` LEFT JOIN event_type et ON et.id=cc.`event_type` WHERE cc.`id`
#{id}

SELECT cyear, cmonth, total,
MAX( CASE deptId WHEN #{item.deptId} THEN COUNT ELSE 0 END ) #{item.deptId}
FROM ( SELECT ccr1.cyear cyear, ccr1.cmonth cmonth, ccr1.deptId deptId, ccr1.count COUNT, ccr2.total total FROM ( SELECT YEAR (crt_time) cyear, MONTH (crt_time) cmonth, dept_id deptId, COUNT(*) COUNT FROM cle_case_registration
WHERE
GROUP BY cyear, cmonth, deptId ) ccr1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEAR (crt_time) cyear, MONTH (crt_time) cmonth, COUNT(*) total FROM cle_case_registration GROUP BY cyear, cmonth ) ccr2 ON ccr1.cyear = ccr2.cyear AND ccr1.cmonth = ccr2.cmonth ) temp GROUP BY cyear, cmonth, total

SELECT inspectItem, code, name, total, MAX( CASE dealType WHEN 'root_biz_caseDealType_zlgz' THEN dealTypeCount ELSE 0 END ) root_biz_caseDealType_zlgz, MAX( CASE dealType WHEN 'root_biz_caseDealType_xccf' THEN dealTypeCount ELSE 0 END ) root_biz_caseDealType_xccf, MAX( CASE dealType WHEN 'root_biz_caseDealType_ybcx' THEN dealTypeCount ELSE 0 END ) root_biz_caseDealType_ybcx, MAX( CASE dealType WHEN 'root_biz_caseDealType_wfxwt' THEN dealTypeCount ELSE 0 END ) root_biz_caseDealType_wfxwt, MAX( CASE dealType WHEN 'root_biz_caseDealType_ajys' THEN dealTypeCount ELSE 0 END ) root_biz_caseDealType_ajys FROM ( SELECT detailG.inspectItem, detailG.dealType, detailG.dealTypeCount, itemG.total, items.code,
items.unlawful_act name FROM ( SELECT inspect_item inspectItem, deal_type dealType, count(id) dealTypeCount FROM cle_case_registration WHERE
GROUP BY inspect_item, deal_type ) detailG LEFT JOIN ( SELECT inspect_item, count(id) total FROM cle_case_registration GROUP BY inspect_item ) itemG ON detailG.inspectItem = itemG.inspect_item
LEFT JOIN rights_issues items ON items.id = detailG.inspectItem ) temp GROUP BY inspectItem, total, code, name ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT ccr.id id, ccr.concerned_type concernedType, ccr.concerned_id concernedId, ccr.case_name caseName, ccr.case_address caseAddress, ccr.case_time caseTime, ccr.case_end caseEnd, ccr.case_source caseSource, ccr.case_informer caseInformerv, ccr.case_informer_addr caseInformerAddr, ccr.case_informer_phone caseInformerPhone, ccr.enforcers enforcers, ccr.case_content caseContent, ccr.case_ongitude ongitude, ccr.case_latitude latitude, ccr.case_address caseAddress, ccr.deal_type dealType, ccr.transfer_depart transferDepart, ccr.deal_suggest dealSuggest, ccr.biz_type bizType, ccr.case_spot_pic caseSpotPic, ccr.case_spot_check caseSpotCheck, ccr.case_check_time caseCheckTime, ccr.case_source_type caseSourceType, et.type_name eventName, ii.`name` inspectName, ag.grid_name gridName FROM cle_case_registration ccr LEFT JOIN event_type et ON et.id = ccr.event_type LEFT JOIN inspect_items ii ON ii.id = ccr.inspect_item LEFT JOIN area_grid ag ON ag.id = ccr.gird_id WHERE ccr.is_deleted = 0 AND ccr.id = #{caseId}

SELECT cyear,cmonth,mapInfoCount,caseOngitude,caseLatitude FROM ( SELECT YEAR(ci.case_time) cyear,MONTH(ci.`case_time`) cmonth,COUNT(ci.case_ongitude) mapInfoCount,ci.case_ongitude caseOngitude,ci.case_latitude caseLatitude FROM cle_case_registration ci WHERE ci.`case_ongitude` IS NOT NULL AND ci.`case_latitude` IS NOT NULL AND ci.`case_time` >= #{startDate} AND ci.`case_time` <= #{endDate} GROUP BY ci.case_ongitude,cyear,cmonth,ci.case_latitude ) resultTmp
